title: K-12 Fundamentals of Deep Learning-Based Holographic Antenna Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of electromagnetism fundamentals, calculus, and matrix operations
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based visualization tools in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: They can explain the fundamental principles of holographic leaky-wave antennas and the orbital angular momentum (OAM) generation mechanism.
They can execute a step-by-step impedance parameter optimization process using deep learning models (CNN/RNN).
They can perform radiation pattern prediction and verification procedures utilizing a dataset of over 77,000 learning data points.

resources: Whiteboard, projector, smartphone visualization apps, printed materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
